title: The Prosecution Rests
itunes:title: The Prosecution Rests
description:
The hags dance around the question of milk and meat. Halloween costumes, pre-school, dining. Childhood is probed. Acting class exercises and acting teachers, skirt suits and 90’s indie film. How to get in at a restaurant and send one’s compliments to the chef.  

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
